    Data de inflación dominicana

    Function reference

    All functions

    crear_mes()
    Change month encoding
    date_label()
    Create date label
    expectativas_details
    Utility complement to handle the macroeconomic expectations
    exports_details
    Utility complement to handle the total exports data
    get_ecc()
    Get ECC
    get_eem()
    Get EEM
    get_eoe()
    Get EOE
    get_expectativas()
    Macroeconomic Expectations
    get_exportaciones()
    Total exports by sectors
    get_exportaciones_zf()
    Free Trade Exports
    get_fbkf()
    Download GROSS FIXED CAPITAL FORMATION BY SECTOR AND TYPE OF GOOD
    get_ied()
    Foreign direct investment to the Dominican Republic
    get_imae()
    Monthly Economic Activity Indicator
    get_importaciones()
    Total imports by sectors
    get_importaciones_petroleo()
    Oil Imports
    get_indicadores_monetarios_bcrd()
    Monetary Indicators of the Central Bank of the Dominican Republic
    get_ipc_data()
    Download the CPI series
    get_ipc_general()
    To get the general CPI data
    get_ipc_grupos()
    To get the CPI data by group of goods and services
    get_ipc_regiones()
    To get the CPI data by geographic region
    get_ipc_subyacente()
    To get the CPI core inflation data
    get_ipc_tnt()
    To get the CPI data by transferable or not
    get_pib_gasto()
    GDP by the expenditure approach, both real and nominal
    get_pib_sectores()
    GDP by the sector of origin, both real and nominal
    get_remesas()
    Remittances to the Dominican Republic
    get_remesas_avg()
    Get average of remittances
    get_remesas_cnt()
    Get quantity of transactions of remittances
    get_remesas_currency()
    Get remittances by currency
    get_remesas_epa()
    Get remittances by payment company
    get_remesas_genero()
    Get remittances by gender
    get_remesas_mensuales()
    Get the monthly remittances
    get_remesas_pais()
    Get remittances by country
    get_remesas_provincias()
    Get remittances by provinces
    get_tasas_activas()
    Download interest rates for loans
    get_tasas_pasivas()
    Download interest rates for savings
    get_tc_eif()
    Average exchange rate of the operations in financial institutions
    get_tc_spot()
    Exchange rates in the spot market of the Dominican Republic
    get_tpm()
    Series of the Monetary Policy Rate of the Dominican Republic
    imports_details
    Utility complement to handle the total imports data
    indicadores_bcrd_details
    Utility complement to handle the monetary indicators data
    read_details()
    Function to read files metadata
    rescale()
    change the scale of a vector
